CustomField.description: Date the Talent Solutions Applicant Opportunity was created or when we actively started perusing the candidate MCarter (case chatter 00070676 - regarding the field being the same as created date): "I'd like to still add those two fields -- we had a few clients sign but then ask us to delay the start day by a few weeks. This would ensure we always have the right date."
